titles.title: All my life long I had panted

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All my life long I had panted For a draught from some cool spring, That I hoped would quench the burning Of the thirst I felt within.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Feeding on the husks around me, Till my strength was almost gone, Longed my soul for something better, Only still to hunger on.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Poor I was, and sought for riches, Something that would satisfy, But the dust I gathered round me Only mocked my soulâ€™s sad cry.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Well of water, ever springing, Bread of life, so rich and free, Untold wealth that never faileth, My Redeemer is to me.{/lang-eng}
